name: Pink Tac Toe
description:
Pinkie Pie wants to play Tic Tac Toe with YOU! Do you have what it takes to hold your own against Ponyville's resident Tic Tac Toe champion?

Pinkie's mood changes depending on how well or poor she is doing. (and I hear she can be a sore loser)

There are 4 difficulty levels. Pinkie Pie can say 110 different things. The game is more complicated than it looks (The Flash file has about 3,500 lines of code in total!)

If the game is going slow for you, make sure to update your flash player! You can also lower the video quality with the "Q" button in the corner.

Enjoy!
